title: Calorie Tracker
tools: TypeScript, NextJS, Tailwind, Neon PostgreSQL, Chakra UI
description: Allows you to track your daily and weekly calorie intake and manage your health goals. Custom authentication control with profile management.

title: Mortgage Calculator API
description: Comprehensive mortgage calculator featuring the ability to generate detailed CSV reports for easy tracking and analysis of mortgage payments.

title: COVID-19 Tracker
description: Fetching worldwide current Covid-19 data. Responsive, with drop down country choice.

title: BoomBox App
description: Play/pause/skip/skip-back/auto-play functionality. Nav bar 'Library', with responsive on-click functionality to switch songs. Mobile friendly.

title: Image File Uploader
description: Image Uploading plugin. Upload, view, delete items. Multiple choice support. Loading bar, description field. Supports PNG, JPG, JPEG types.

title: Etch-A-Sketch
description: Good old Etch-A-Sketch game, but improved! Supports grid selection(1-100).
